title: Overseerr LXC
textContent:
Overseerr LXC 
                Overseerr is a request
                    management and media discovery tool built to work with your existing Plex ecosystem.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Overseerr LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update Overseerr, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/overseerr.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                Overseerr Interface: IP:5055
outerHTML:
Overseerr LXC

Overseerr is a request management and media discovery tool built to work with your existing Plex ecosystem.

To create a new Proxmox VE Overseerr LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Overseerr, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/overseerr.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Overseerr Interface: IP:5055
